update comic_video
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comic_xiaoimg = #{comicXiaoimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ji_number = #{jiNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
